body.p: The undersigned your petitioners would respectfully state that on the 28th day of February 1861 Alfred a negro slave the property of Joseph Shawhan Senr of Harrison county killed Andy, a negro slave the property of Daniel Shawhan of Bourbon county, under circumstances which are stated in the minutes of the examing court. Your petitioners would state that they do not suppose that Alfred would be punished severaly, if at all, for the offence, if he were tried before the circuit court of Bourbon county, and would therefore pray that Your Excellency would therefore pardon Alfred, his master Joseph Shawhan promising to send him out of the state in the want of his being pardoned.
